attributes.action: Give people who work in London a right to vote for the next mayor of London
attributes.additional_details:
I believe the government are the right people to make this decision, as they are independent from the mayors office. 
I believe we should have a referendum style vote.
attributes.background: I believe people who work in London and live outside of London should be given the right to vote for the next mayor of London. The mayor makes decisions which effect the people who work in London as much as Londoners for example the ulez expansion.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Give everyone within the Home Counties a vote for the London Mayor:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643187

We also cannot accept petitions that do not include a full name.
